name: top_players_by_matchmaking
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trackmania.
Tool description: Get Stats, Matches and Leaderboards from Trackmania (Unofficial).
API description: Fetch the top players by their matchmaking rank from the TrackMania API.

limit.description: The result limit that gets returned. Default limit is `50`.

page.description: The page number for the results, each containing 50 results. Default is `0`.
